EditorData.AnimationTags: [DG] Laezel (Orin) transforms into her true form.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: SHORT Orin transforms.

Text.Value: Slow. You'll need to be much, much faster if you want to save the big ox.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin smiles unpleasantly.No dagger, it was thrown away at this point.

Text.Value: I can see your mind at work, my friend. But it's too late. Time to let go...
Raise your palms in a peaceful gesture. Try to calm him.
Do you think a poultice will unspill your friend's guts? A herbal tea will ungouge his eyes? Try if you like - the time to save him is dwindling fast...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin smiles unpleasantly. lowering the dagger.

The player lunges forwards, but with uncanny speed of reaction, Halsin flings the blade shooting past the player's ear. The player dodges it, only to see it vanish into smoke. They turn back to Halsin, confused -
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The player attempts to rush Halsin and grab the knife. Halsin flips the knife around and throws it at the player.The knfe just misses and impales itself on the door behind the player.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin throws the knife at the player. It just misses and hits the door. Some dust particles/wood chippings when the knife hits the wood could be nice

Text.Value: After all you've been through together, you just idly stand by as he pours his heart out for you? Tut tut.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin pulls out the blade from his chest with both hands. He smiles unpleasantly.

Text.Value: Get away from Scratch - now.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin closes his eyes and RAMS the blade into his guts. He splutters, opens his eyes wide with the pain.

Text.Value: No. You're responsible for your own actions. And you'll have to pay for them as well.
It's this place. This city. I can feel its corruption eating away at me. I should not be here - no one should be here.
Uuargh.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin, standing up right in human form, starts to sway, losing his balance. He drops to the ground on all fours. He roars in frustration, still in his human form (Human roar). It is as if he may turn back to a bear at any moment, involuntarily.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin screams and falls to the floor

Text.Value: Did you enjoy the show? It was but an opening act, blood brother.
Did you enjoy the show? It was but an opening act, blood sister.
Did you enjoy the show? It was but an opening act, blood kin.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin pulls out the blade from his belly with both hands. He smiles.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin brandishes a dastardly smile. He lowers the blade to his gut and stabs himself. He rips the blade across his stomach. He stands up
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD]  Halsin lowers the blade to his gut and stabs himself. He rips the blade across his stomach. He stands up with the knife still embedded in his guts. Lots and lots of blood

Text.Value: It has made a monster of me.
I will not allow it. I will not surrender control. Even in this place, there are still innocents.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Halsin, down on all fours, straightens up so that he is kneeling in front of the player. 

He draws a dagger, places the tip of it over his heart, holding it with both hands.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin takes out a knife and holds it up to his chest

Text.Value: *Whine.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The bear looks back at the motionless victim on the floor, lets out a cry of anguish.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The bear whines and is anguished

Text.Value: I am an archdruid - every fibre of my mind is attuned to nature. Give it time - you will sense the rot as well.
*Growl.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player enters camp. Pauses - what's that sound? Coming from a secluded area of camp, the angry growl/roar of an animal in distress. (this is Halsin in bear form - anguished, going mad)
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Angry bear noises coming from somewhere nearby. Player runs to investigate

Text.Value: Do nothing.
The blood is on my hands, in the end. No more.
How can you be sure? I feel no such corruption.
I shall - trust me. But heed my words. This city is doomed.
*ROAR.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player rushes towards the sound. They find Halsin, in bear form, his back to us. He turns and ROARS at us, eyes red, spittle flying, rabid. We see beyond him, to Scratch/Yenna lying motionless on the ground.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Player finds the a bear standing over either Yenna or Scratch. The bear roars

Text.Value: Oak Father forgive me... I can explain, I swear.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin transforms back to his regular form. He looks sickened, close to death.
EditorData.NodeContext: Saddened, horrified. First part to self, rest to player.

Text.Value: My body is trying to fight the corruption... but it's losing. And my mind will succumb soon after.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
When he removes his hand from his face, we see he's coughed up blood.

Node starts with Halsin lowering his right hand from his mouth. He holds his hand out in front of him for a moment, revealing that he has coughed up blood. This is while he delivers the VO line.
EditorData.NodeContext: Slightly more lucid, but stricken and fearful

Text.Value: You're an archdruid. Whatever's affecting you, resist it.
*ROAR.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player rushes towards the sound. They find Halsin, in bear form, his back to us. He turns and ROARS at us, eyes red, spittle flying, rabid. We see beyond him, to Scratch/Yenna lying motionless on the ground.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Player finds the a bear standing over either Yenna or Scratch. The bear roars

Text.Value: *Growl.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player enters camp. Pauses - what's that sound? Coming from a secluded area of camp, the angry growl/roar of an animal in distress. (this is Halsin in bear form - anguished, going mad)
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Angry bear noises coming from somewhere nearby. Player runs to investigate

Text.Value: Slap the blade from his hand.
You almost figured it out. But almost won't save your friend. You had better up your game if you hope to truly save him.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin pulls out the blade from his chest with noth hands. He smiles unpleasantly.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself, screams in pain. Then he begins to laugh and stands up
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself in the chest. Lots of blood. When he stands up the knife remains embedded in his chest

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin transforms into Orin.

Text.Value: I can't... Whatever powers I have, they are dwarfed by the evil of this place.
Get away from her - now.
...Or is it? Perhaps if you're a little faster, you may yet save the big ox.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin pulls out the bladefrom his chest both hands. He smiles.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself, screams in pain. Then he begins to laugh and stands up
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself in the chest. Lots of blood. When he stands up the knife remains embedded in his chest

Text.Value: I don't understand. What does the city have to do with this?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches out their hands in a placatory, soothing gesture (doesn't make contact).

Text.Value: Please... wait. I did not want this. I could not stop it.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin transforms back to his regular form. He looks sickened, close to death.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The bear rears up and then falls back down. As the bear falls it wildshapes into Halsin
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] The bear rears up and then falls back down. As the bear falls it wildshapes into Halsin

Text.Value: There is only one god fit to be bowed to in this place. The last god who will ever be knelt before... then all of this will tear itself apart -

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Halsin cuts off suddenly, racked with a horrible cough. He covers his mouth with his hand. 

We need Halsin standing for this line. Then he coughs at the end of the node, lowering his head a little, covering his mouth with the palm of his right hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: End with a violent cough (coughing up blood)

Text.Value: Lower! Stick it in the guts, not the heart! Make it last!
So close to grasping the problem, but you fell short all the same. You had better sharpen those wits if you hope to spare your friend the true blade.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin smiles unpleasantly. lowering the dagger.

Text.Value: *Snarl.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The bear advances on the player, snarling. The player steps back, braces for an attack - but the bear pauses. His eyes soften.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The bear whines and is anguished

Text.Value: Mmm. I feel like a new man. A sharp blade is a true tonic. Your friend will find out for himself, soon enough...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin pulls out the blade from his chest with both hands. He smiles.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself, screams in pain. Then he begins to laugh and stands up
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin stabs himself in the chest. Lots of blood. When he stands up the knife remains embedded in his chest

Text.Value: Silvanus has abandoned this place. It's nothing but stone, grime, smoke, pain. The trees choke here. The animals hang from butchers' hooks. Nature is dying in the gutter.

EditorData.NodeContext: Growing more intense, as if becoming overcome by anger and dark thoughts.

Text.Value: Wait - this must be Orin's doing. She's compromised our camp.
Attack.
No. This is how it must be...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Holding blade with both hands  at his heart

Text.Value: Halsin...? What have you done?!
It has everything to do with this place. The rot is all around us.
Think fast. There must be another explanation for this - some way to treat Halsin.

Synopsis:
The first longrest in Undercity, Orin will abduct one of the players companion. (Laezel, Halsin, Gale or Minthara). Based on the players approval rating with them. (Friend, Good Friend and Romance) Highest approval will be the highest priority.

She will appear in camp impersonating her abducted victim and toy with the players. Shortly after, she grows tire of the game and reveals herself. And gives her ultimatum - Kill Gortash and retrieve his Netherstone - and bring it to her at her Bhaal Temple. Or the abducted companion dies. She will then teleport away.
